name: 9 Tiles !
description:
Boost your brain! Tap the right tiles to repeat the pattern.

9 Tiles will let you improve your visual skills by training your brain. Tap tiles to activate them and reproduce the displayed pattern.
Beware, the pattern can rotate at any time. You will have to find your way with the help of the arrow. Easy to understand, hard to master.

Each good answer gives you extra time and bonus points. But each wrong answer will reset your bonus points.

Reproduce as many patterns as you can and get the best score! Try now for FREE!

Explore the new mode: Challenges and achieve them all!

Game features:
◉ Free
◉ Easy gameplay (tap)
◉ Endless gameplay
◉ Offline friendly

Crafted with love under the sun of Montpellier and the freshness of French Alps by Pixel Rocket game studio.
